title: The Number Twelve Looks Like You Discography
description:
*******************************************************
*******************************************************
***                                                 ***
***  Please help support not only this  torrent by  ***
***  seeding to at  least a 1.0 ratio, but also by  ***
***  supporting the musicians that make this music  ***
***  by going out and buying  their  music, merch,  ***
***  going to their  shows, or even just  donating  ***
***  some  money to them!  At least telling  other  ***
***  people to buy their album to check it out. =)  ***
***                                                 ***
*******************************************************
*******************************************************
+-----------------------------------------------------+
|                                                     |
|  This torrent is pretty much a discography for The  |
|  Number Twelve Looks Like You                       |
|                                                     |
|  It includes the following albums:                  |
|                                                     |
|    * Here At The End Of All Things [2008]           |
|    * Mongrel [2007]                                 |
|    * Nuclear. Sad. Nuclear [2005]                   |
|    * An Inch Of Gold For An Inch Of Time EP [2005]  |
|    * Put On Your Rosy Red Glasses [2003]            |
|                                                     |
|  Does NOT include following albums:                 |
|                                                     |
|    * The Number Twelve Looks Like You EP [2007]     |
|       - The EP, released in '07, it is a Hot Topic  |
|         only  release.  If anyone has it, or knows  |
|         where it is, please let me know.            |
|    * The Remixes [2008]                             |
|      - The album,  released in '08, was also a Hot  |
|        Topic  only  release. I couldn't find it at  |
|        all. again please let me know.               |
|                                                     |
|  I'm waiting for their new album coming in '09.     |
|                                                     |
+-----------------------------------------------------+
|                                                     |
|   Check out my other torrents if you'd like! You    |
|      might find something you like :) Cheers!       |
|                                                     |
+-----------------------------------------------------+
